thread.title: BRIEF-Valencia Provides Update On Earthrenew Acquisition

title: BRIEF-Valencia Provides Update On Earthrenew Acquisition
text: February 14, 2018 / 7:52 PM / Updated 20 minutes ago BRIEF-Valencia Provides Update On Earthrenew Acquisition Reuters Staff Feb 14 (Reuters) - Valencia Ventures Inc: * VALENCIA PROVIDES UPDATE ON EARTHRENEW ACQUISITION * SAYS ‍EARTHRENEW MANAGEMENT IS ALSO EVALUATING HARDWARE OPTIONS TO MINE OTHER CRYPTOCURRENCIES​ * SAYS ‍EARTHRENEW MANAGEMENT INTENDS TO MINE A VARIETY OF CRYPTOCURRENCIES AT STRATHMORE PLANT IN FUTURE​ * SAYS ‍NEW BITCOIN MINING RIGS ARE SCHEDULED TO BE DELIVERED IN LATE MARCH​ * SAYS ‍EARTHRENEW REPORTS IT BOUGHT 20 ANTMINER S9 MINING RIGS FROM BITMAIN TO COMMENCE BITCOIN MINING ACTIVITIES AT PLANT IN STRATHMORE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
